title: The Faculty Dance
description: Dean Bradley gives Prof. McNulty the task of organizing the annual faculty dinner dance. He hires some entertainment, but at the last minute they cancel and McNulty is forced to use a seedy talent agency--which sends over an Arabian burlesque act.

title: The Christmas Story
description: A French student spends Christmas with The McNulty Family.

title: Ray's Other Life
description: Professor McNulty's former girlfriend, an actress, comes to town.

title: The Egg and Ray
description: The McNulty's parakeet lays an egg but then ignores it.

title: Fashion Model
description: Peggy worries that Ray will find out she scheduled to model bathing suits and lingerie in front of a group of men.

title: Battle of the Sexes
description: Husbands and wives at Comstock University reach for war clubs when Prof. and Mrs. McNulty become the unofficial campus marriage counselors.

title: The Silver Cord
description: The McNultys help save a drama student from the domination of her globe-trotting mother.

title: Call Me Dad
description: The McNulty's hire a klutzy coed as a part-time housekeeper. The young student is so in love that she can't keep her mind on her work, so the professor decides to become her legal guardian to ease her way into matrimony.

title: Be Bop
description: Mrs. McNulty ventures into songwriting with a number called "Mopshilu".

title: Tryout
description: A Broadway playwright visits campus to see the play written by a student.

title: Reunion in Comstock
description: An embittered, wealthy alumnus helps Prof. McNulty out of a tight spot.

title: International Incident
description: McNulty casts the parts of Romeo and Juliet and unwittingly creates an incident that nearly winds up at the United Nations.
